titleStmt.title: A Catechisme so short for little children, that they may understand, and learne it by two or three yeares of their age : with prayers and thanksgiving also adjoyned, and grace before and after meate.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Kembe, and are to be sold at his shop on St. Margerets Hill in Southwarke,

notesStmt.note: Corrected imprint date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on St. Margerets Hill in Southwarke
